option.od: print the help message and exit.
verbose. Log information to the console.
the input file is a cnvmap format file.
set the order of fit to be order.
set the doping level to dp. Possible values are low, medium, or high.
filename of the map format file. If this is omitted, the file will be read from standard input.

synopsis.p: Calculates the statistical model and adds it to a convection map file.

description.p: Calculates the statistical model and adds it to a convection map file.
The file created is written to standard output.
The input convection map file must have valid IMF data.

example.description: Adds model vectors to the map file called "19981020.map". The order of fit is set to 8 and the doping level to light. The file created is called "19981020.model.map" and status is logged to standard error.
